devdoc.details: This is an implementation of the D100Token Index Fund protocol.      D100Token operates symmetrically on expansion and contraction. It will both split and      combine coins to maintain a stable unit price.      This component regulates the token supply of the D100Token ERC20 token in response to      market oracles.

returns._0: If the latest block timestamp is within the rebase time window it, returns true.         Otherwise, returns false.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

rebase().details: The supply adjustment equals (_totalSupply * DeviationFromTargetRate) / rebaseLag      Where DeviationFromTargetRate is (TokenPriceOracleRate - targetPrice) / targetPrice      and targetPrice is mktcapOracleRate / D100mktcap

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.deviationThreshold_: The new exchange rate threshold fraction.

params.orchestrator_: The address of the orchestrator contract.

params.minRebaseTimeIntervalSec_: More than this much time must pass between rebase        operations, in seconds.
params.rebaseWindowLengthSec_: The length of the rebase window in seconds.
params.rebaseWindowOffsetSec_: The number of seconds from the beginning of the rebase interval, where the rebase window begins.

params.tokenPriceOracle_: The address of the token price oracle contract.

params.mktcapOracle_: The address of the mktcap oracle contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: D100Token Monetary Supply Policy

rebase().notice: Initiates a new rebase operation, provided the minimum time period has elapsed.

setDeviationThreshold(uint256).notice: Sets the deviation threshold fraction. If the exchange rate given by the market         oracle is within this fractional distance from the targetRate, then no supply         modifications are made. DECIMALS fixed point number.

setOrchestrator(address).notice: Sets the reference to the orchestrator.

setRebaseLag(uint256).notice: Sets the rebase lag parameter. It is used to dampen the applied supply adjustment by 1 / rebaseLag If the rebase lag R, equals 1, the smallest value for R, then the full supply correction is applied on each rebase cycle. If it is greater than 1, then a correction of 1/R of is applied on each rebase.

setRebaseTimingParameters(uint256,uint25.notice: Sets the parameters which control the timing and frequency of         rebase operations.         a) the minimum time period that must elapse between rebase cycles.         b) the rebase window offset parameter.         c) the rebase window length parameter.

setTokenPriceOracle(address).notice: Sets the reference to the token price oracle.

setmktcapOracle(address).notice: Sets the reference to the market cap oracle.
